title: Blended Learning-Based Secondary Mathematics Job Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts, experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: In-service secondary teachers apply a blended learning model to enhance mathematics instruction, integrating face-to-face/non-face-to-face activities for project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can solve math concept application problems with 80% accuracy in a blended learning environment
Learners can design one secondary-level math lesson plan according to blended learning design principles
Learners can improve project outcomes three or more times through peer and self-assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
